title: Finance Bill, 2022 passed in Lok Sabha - Moneycontrol
content:
1. Finance Bill, 2022 passed in Lok Sabha  Moneycontrol
  2. Lok Sabha passes Finance Bill; completes budgetary exercise for FY23  Economic Times
  3. Lok Sabha live updates | Discussion under way on the Finance Bill, 2022  The Hindu
  4. Finance Bill tweaks proposed by government  Mint
  5. Lok Sabha passes 'The Finance Bill, 2022', completes Budgetary exercise for FY23  Business Today
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: The Finance Bill was approved by the Lower House after accepting 39 official amendments moved by Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman and rejecting the amendments proposed by the opposition by voice vote.
